title: Subpart 8188-2 - Assessors (outside Of New York City)
content:

§ 8188-2.1 - Certification requirement for assessors, generally
§ 8188-2.2 - Minimum qualification standards for appointed assessors
§ 8188-2.3 - Reports of appointments, designations and elections of assessors
§ 8188-2.4 - Application
§ 8188-2.5 - Review of application
§ 8188-2.6 - Basic course of training
§ 8188-2.7 - Interim certification

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
